The Video Piers Morgan Doesn’t Want You...** **Apologists For Evil** **• PARASITE** **•A Matter of Agency: The Straight Dope about...** **The General Plan Of Genocide** **USA ADMITS: “We are preparing for war”** **Defiance or Conciliation } Dispatches from Oliver Boyd-Barrett** **• Celebrity activists Greta Thunberg and Liam Cunningham...** **French Dock Workers REFUSE TO LOAD Israeli Weapons...** **• Bobcat: the hunt for truth** Far more urgent are the riots in LA and now protests at Trump Tower in NYC. Are these spreading rebellions the fore bringers of an American revolution? I initially misheard what Jeff Brown said.He said the US intention towards the Taiwanese was to Ukrainise them.I thought Jeff said “euthanise them”.And then I realised it was the same thing.The only people who deserve to be euthanised are the would be mass murderers of innocent civilians, the filthy SuckingToady of Offense Pig Hogsbreath and his ilk. Definitely deserves a bullet between his beady little piggy eyes, which will solve a lot of problems. What the LA demonstrations show unlike what the California governor and the LA mayor say, that these are not minor protests. The story is that Trump wishes to provoke protests in order to be able to suppress them, but reasonably he understands the danger and threatand acts the correct way. These rebellions could well predict a cold revolution, the real stuff then to follow. The uproars in LA are quite different from previous riots there.
